birth_place.zh-cn: 福建省泉州市惠安县洛阳镇梅岭村
birth_place.en: Meiling Village, Luoyang Town, Hui'an County, Quanzhou, Fujian Province

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前政治人物及理论家，曾长期担任毛泽东的秘书。在文化大革命期间担任中共中央政治局常委、中央文革小组组长，后被列为“林彪、江青反革命集团”主犯之一。
description.en: A former political figure and theorist of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Mao Zedong's secretary for a long time. During the Cultural Revolution, he served as a Standing Committee Member of the CPC Politburo and Head of the Central Cultural Revolution Group, and was later listed as a principal offender in the 'Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques'.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家，中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founder of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会
en: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导机构。
description.en: The highest leadership body of the Communist Party of China.

en: 8th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

zh-cn: 中国共产党第九届中央委员会
en: 9th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间中国共产党的最高权力机构之一。
description.en: One of the highest authorities of the Communist Party of China during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China who was pivotal in the Communist victory in the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第一任国务院总理。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第九届中央委员会第二次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第九届中央委员会第二次全体会议
en: Second Plenary Session of the 9th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 在庐山召开的中共中央全会，会上林彪、陈伯达等人与毛泽东在设立国家主席等问题上发生严重分歧，成为陈伯达政治生涯的转折点。
description.en: A plenary session of the CPC Central Committee held in Lushan, where Lin Biao, Chen Boda, and others had serious disagreements with Mao Zedong on issues such as the establishment of the state chairmanship, marking a turning point in Chen Boda's political career.

en: Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命后，中华人民共和国政府对林彪集团和四人帮的官方称谓。
description.en: The official designation by the PRC government for the Lin Biao clique and the Gang of Four after the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席，在文化大革命中被迫害致死。
description.en: A former major leader of the CPC and PRC, who served as Chairman of the People's Republic of China and was persecuted to death during the Cultural Revolution.

en: Northern Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 因陈伯达讲话而引发的大规模政治迫害事件，导致冀东地区大量党员干部和群众被诬陷为国民党和叛徒，造成严重后果。
description.en: A large-scale political persecution incident triggered by Chen Boda's speech, which led to a large number of party cadres and masses in the Eastern Hebei area being framed as KMT members and traitors, with severe consequences.

en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家元首职位。
description.en: The head of state position of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东于1970年8月31日为批判陈伯达而写的文章。
description.en: An article written by Mao Zedong on August 31, 1970, to criticize Chen Boda.

en: Criticize Chen and Rectify Work Style Campaign

description.zh-cn: 中共在九届二中全会后，自上而下开展的旨在批判陈伯达的政治运动。
description.en: A political campaign launched by the CPC from top to bottom after the Second Plenary Session of the 9th Central Committee to criticize Chen Boda.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心，改革开放的总设计师。
description.en: The core of the second generation of Chinese Communist Party leadership and the paramount leader who led China through far-reaching market-economy reforms.

description.zh-cn: 指林彪等人乘专机出逃，坠毁于蒙古的事件，标志着林彪政治集团的覆灭。
description.en: Refers to the event where Lin Biao and others fled by plane and crashed in Mongolia, marking the demise of Lin Biao's political group.

nodes.id: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

zh-cn: 林彪、江青反革命集团案
en: Trial of the Gang of Four and the Lin Biao Counter-Revolutionary Clique

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院特别法庭对林彪、江青两个反革命集团案10名主犯的公开审判。
description.en: The public trial of ten principal offenders from the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques by the Special Court of the Supreme People's Court of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的第四任妻子，四人帮成员之一。
description.en: The fourth wife of Mao Zedong and a member of the Gang of Four.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 陈伯达长期担任毛泽东的秘书，前后共达31年，是毛泽东思想的重要阐释者。
description.en: Chen Boda served as Mao Zedong's secretary for a total of 31 years and was a key interpreter of Mao Zedong Thought.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 在中共八届十一中全会上增选为中共中央政治局常委，成为仅次于毛泽东、林彪、周恩来的中共“第四号人物”。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Politburo at the 11th Plenary Session of the 8th Central Committee, becoming the 'fourth person' in the CPC after Mao Zedong, Lin Biao, and Zhou Enlai.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第八届中央委员会
中国共产党第九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 陈伯达在中共九大上当选为政治局常委，但在九届二中全会后失势。
description.en: Chen Boda was elected as a member of the Politburo Standing Committee at the 9th CPC National Congress, but fell from power after the Second Plenary Session of the 9th Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 陈伯达在文化大革命初期担任中央文革小组组长，是运动的主要领导者之一。
description.en: Chen Boda served as the leader of the Central Cultural Revolution Group in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, and was one of the main leaders of the movement.

description.zh-cn: 陈伯达在文化大革命中被指充当林彪势力的主要成员。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Chen Boda was accused of being a key member of Lin Biao's faction.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第九届中央委员会第二次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 会上，陈伯达因抛出“天才论”和坚持设国家主席而受到毛泽东等人的批判，会后即被审查，并失去人身自由，标志着其政治生涯的终结。
description.en: At the meeting, Chen Boda was criticized by Mao Zedong and others for promoting the 'genius theory' and insisting on establishing the state chairmanship. He was investigated and lost his personal freedom after the meeting, marking the end of his political career.

description.zh-cn: 1981年，陈伯达被中国共产党列为“林彪、江青反革命集团”主犯之一并受审。
description.en: In 1981, Chen Boda was listed and tried by the Communist Party of China as one of the main culprits of the 'Lin Biao and Jiang Qing Counter-revolutionary Cliques'.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，陈伯达作为中央文革小组组长，参与了对时任国家主席刘少奇的批判和迫害。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, as the head of the Central Cultural Revolution Group, Chen Boda participated in the criticism and persecution of then-State Chairman Liu Shaoqi.

position.zh-cn: 中共中央北方局宣传部部长
position.en: Minister of the Propaganda Department of the Northern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 1936年春，时任中共中央北方局书记的刘少奇提名陈伯达担任宣传部部长。
description.en: In the spring of 1936, Liu Shaoqi, then Secretary of the Northern Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, nominated Chen Boda to be the Minister of the Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 在九届二中全会上，毛泽东严厉批评了陈伯达提出的“天才论”及设立国家主席的主张，并亲自撰写《我的一点意见》进行批判，直接导致陈伯达倒台。
description.en: At the Second Plenary Session of the 9th Central Committee, Mao Zedong severely criticized Chen Boda's 'genius theory' and proposal to establish a state chairmanship. He personally wrote 'My Little Opinion' to criticize him, which directly led to Chen Boda's downfall.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来在华北会议上作总结讲话，系统地揭露了陈伯达的罪行。
description.en: Zhou Enlai delivered a concluding speech at the North China Conference, systematically exposing Chen Boda's crimes.

description.zh-cn: 经毛泽东批准，陈伯达率领工作组到人民日报社夺权。
description.en: With Mao Zedong's approval, Chen Boda led a work team to seize power at the People's Daily office.

description.zh-cn: 陈伯达在唐山的讲话直接引发了冀东地下党大冤案，造成了严重的政治迫害。
description.en: Chen Boda's speech in Tangshan directly triggered the major injustice case of the Eastern Hebei underground party, causing severe political persecution.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东撰写《我的一点意见》一文，批判陈伯达为假马克思主义者、野心家、阴谋家。
description.en: Mao Zedong wrote the article 'My Little Opinion' to criticize Chen Boda as a sham Marxist, careerist, and conspirator.

description.zh-cn: 该运动旨在系统性地批判和清算陈伯达的政治和历史问题。
description.en: This campaign was aimed at systematically criticizing and purging Chen Boda's political and historical issues.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在给毛泽东的信中，将陈伯达与林彪并列为反革命集团，并对其个人品质作出负面评价。
description.en: In a letter to Mao Zedong, Deng Xiaoping equated Chen Boda with Lin Biao as a counter-revolutionary clique and made negative comments on his personal character.

description.zh-cn: 九一三事件后，作为林彪集团的重要成员，陈伯达的处境进一步恶化，同日被移送至秦城监狱关押。
description.en: After the September 13 Incident, as a key member of the Lin Biao clique, Chen Boda's situation worsened, and he was transferred to Qincheng Prison on the same day.

relationships.source: 林彪、江青反革命集团案

description.zh-cn: 在该案的审判中，陈伯达被判处有期徒刑18年。
description.en: In the trial of this case, Chen Boda was sentenced to 18 years in prison.

description.zh-cn: 陈伯达晚年自述，其垮台的原因之一是和江青产生了冲突。
description.en: In his later years, Chen Boda stated that one of the reasons for his downfall was his conflict with Jiang Qing.

description.zh-cn: 陈伯达于1927年4月加入中国共产党，1973年在中共十大上被开除党籍。
description.en: Chen Boda joined the Communist Party of China in April 1927 and was expelled from the party at the 10th National Congress of the CPC in 1973.
